articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba.
					 The message extended warm congratulations to Raul Castro Ruz on his birthday and sincerely wished him good health and greater success in his responsible work in the future.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from National Leader of Workers' Party of Mexico
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from National Leader of Workers' Party of Mexico
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned on Tuesday by Laura Julieta, member of the National Executive Committee of the party who is heading the delegation of the party, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK FM Holds Talks with Foreign Dignitaries
articles.content:
DPRK FM Holds Talks with Foreign Dignitaries
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, separately held talks with the president of Asian Olympic Council and the director general of Kuwait Fund for Arab Economic Development in Kuwait on June 1.
					 The DPRK government delegation headed by him arrived in Kuwait on the same day.

articles.title: Secretary of Borno State Government of Nigeria Here
articles.content:
Secretary of Borno State Government of Nigeria Here
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Jidda Baba Ahmed, secretary of the Borno State Government of Nigeria, and his party arrived here on Tuesday.

articles.title: One-day Bus Tour of Hoeryong by Chinese People
articles.content:
One-day Bus Tour of Hoeryong by Chinese People
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Chinese people made the first one-day bus tour of Hoeryong City, North Hamgyong Province, the DPRK.
					 After the tour, the Chinese tourists told that they were deeply impressed by their visit to the DPRK.
					
					 Jin Bo (male: 55), deputy director of the Foreign Affairs Office in Yanbian Korean Nationality Autonomous Prefecture, told as follows:
					
					 The one-day tour from Longjin to Hoeryong, China by Chinese bus helped the tourists deepen their friendly feelings towards the DPRK.
					
					 The tourism course was very excellent. Many tourists said that they felt as if they were in Pyongyang.
					
					 I think one-day tour of Hoeryong will be one of major attractions for Chinese in the near future.
					
					 Sha Chunxia (female: 44), a staff of Yanbian News, said:
					
					 I was deeply moved to see an art performance given by kindergarteners.
					
					 It was hardly believable that the five-or six-year old children could give such an excellent performance.
					
					 I have never thought of giving art education to my daughter.
					
					 The educational system in the DPRK is very admirable.
					
					 I want my daughter to be educated under such excellent system.
					
					 Later, I will come together with my daughter to see the performance.

articles.title: Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- An increasing number of people visited the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site on the occasion of the 77th anniversary of the victory in the battle in Pochonbo commanded by President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 Exhibited in the battle site situated in Ryanggang Province are historical relics showing the superb operation and command of Kim Il Sung who put forward a policy on advancing to the motherland and led the battle to victory.
					
					 The battle site involves a revolutionary battle site at the Kusi Barrage and Konjang Hill, the command post designated by him and the then police substation of the Japanese imperialists, the sub-county administrative office, the fire station, etc. which were occupied by the Korean People's Revolutionary Army which mounted a surprise attack.
					
					 Preserved there are the mementoes of field guidance by the President to the battle site in May, Juche 47 (1958) and in August, Juche 52 (1963) and buildings visited by leader Kim Jong Il when he came there in June, Juche 45 (1956), leading the study-tour group of revolutionary battle sites and mementoes of his visit. 
					
					 There are also the monument to the revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung and the Pochonbo Revolutionary Museum.
					
					 More than 20.59 million visitors including service personnel, people from all walks of life, school youth and children, many overseas Koreans and foreigners visited the battle site for more than six decades.
					
					 Entering this year, many people visited the battle site and their number is increasing day by day.

articles.title: Furniture Layout "Jonthong"
articles.content:
Furniture Layout "Jonthong"
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Furniture layout "Jonthong (tradition)" won a high appreciation at the 14th May 21 Architectural Festival held in the DPRK some days ago.
					 It was presented by Jong Su Ryon, a teacher, and An Un Ok, a student, of Pyongyang University of Architecture.
					
					 Jong and An have exerted themselves to produce peculiar layout, true to the instruction on developing the furniture designing supreme leader Kim Jong Un gave in his letter to the participants in the great workshop of officials in the construction field in December last year.
					
					 They focused their attention on applying the traditional Korean ornamental techniques to furniture design and preparing Korean-style furniture layout suitable to the people's tastes and cultural and emotional demands.
					
					 In the layout they ensured utility and formative influence by introducing mother-of-pearl lacquering and other Korean-style ornamental techniques.

articles.title: Coating Gel for Granite Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Coating Gel for Granite Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The Nano Materials Institute under the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK has developed a new kind of coating gel to prevent granite from being stained.
					 This gel, made of inorganic compound, has a self-washing function. In general, 30-70ml of gel is applied to one square meter of granite plate twice at intervals of two hours to film it. Then when water is sprayed on the filmed granite in a week, the self-washing function will operate soon.
					
					 The gel helps prevent the surface of granite from being polluted or moss-covered, by such natural energies as sunshine, wind and rain.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Learning from Creative Work Style of Moranbong Band
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Learning from Creative Work Style of Moranbong Band
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday editorially calls upon all creators and artistes in the field of literature and arts to kindle the torch for creating masterpieces by learning from the creative work style of the Moranbong Band and thus glorify  the new century of Juche with a heyday of the Juche-oriented literature and arts.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The creative work style of the Moranbong Band is a revolutionary one representing the new era of building the Juche-oriented literature and arts and a militant work style to be followed by all persons in the field of literature and arts of pulsating Songun Korea.
					
					 Now is the time to mass-produce literary and art works truthfully reflecting the worthwhile life of the Korean people who work hard for better morrow with great aspiration and dream and masterpieces steering the times, instilling faith of sure victory and dynamism into all the service personnel and people.
					
					 The masterpieces desired by our party are those works arousing and exciting the people and popular among them and to be handed down to posterity.
					
					 When all creators and artistes earnestly learn from and follow the creative work style of the band, our literature and arts will shine as the people's genuine literature and arts loved and trusted by them.
					
					 A shining heyday will be ushered in the Juche-oriented literature and arts when our persons of literature and arts create every work as a monumental masterpiece of the era and world-famous hit.

articles.title: S. Korean Society in Danger: S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
S. Korean Society in Danger: S. Korean Paper
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on May 28 carried an editorial titled "Society is in danger as it is torn with ceaseless disasters."
					 The editorial said a fire in a hospital in Jangsong, South Jolla Province, left 20 aged persons and one nurse dead. 
					
					 The editorial went on:
					
					 This is a horrible accident in the wake of a series of accidents like ferry Sewol sinking, electric car clash in Seoul Metro and a fire in Koyang in Kyonggi Province, clearly indicating at what peril south Korean society is put.
					
					 The recent fire, in particular, is just the same as the fire in Phohang in North Kyongsang Province in 2010. In the final analysis, it proves that the authorities have not drawn any lesson from the accidents which claimed a lot of casualties. 
					
					 The hospitals, where disabled aged persons are being treated, have neither proper safety facilities nor automatic fire-detection equipment. 
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime should take fundamental measures to prevent the recurrence of the similar accident in which ailing old persons cannot escape death.

articles.title: S. Korean Professors Call for Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Professors Call for Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Over 200 professors of Seoul National University of south Korea made public a statement on May 30 demanding the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster, according to the south Korean newspaper Hangyore.
					As regards the disaster the "government", media, businesses, the captain and bureaucrats fully revealed their barbarity, the statement said.
					
					People should not remain silent any longer, bearing all pains to be entailed by this, it held.
					
					It demanded a thoroughgoing probe into the truth about the disaster including the whole story of the disaster and its cause through the formation of a fact-finding organization with the bereaved families involved, separated from the "government".
					
					It stressed the need to strictly call to account those responsible for the disaster and issue a report containing the whole course of investigation so that all people may see it.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Denounce Park Geun Hye's Personnel Policy
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Denounce Park Geun Hye's Personnel Policy
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on May 28 carried an editorial as regards An Tae Hui's withdrawal as a candidate for the puppet prime minister.
					 The editorial said the disclosure of the fact that An, who held the post of a justice of the Supreme Court, was paid 10 million won a day, the same amount he received when he was in the office, forced him to give up candidacy under bitter criticism.
					
					 Even before the "National Assembly" hearing An was compelled to withdraw the candidacy for his inglorious past, the editorial said, holding that, needless to say, Park Geun Hye was wholly to blame for this.
					
					 The editorial continued:
					
					 There was no need to make such great haste to appoint a new prime minister as Jong Hong Won is still performing his duty as "prime minister". 
					
					 May 22 when Park designated An as a candidate for the prime minister was the day when the campaign for the June 4 local elections formally started.
					
					 It is not exaggeration to say that this was a wrong handling of personnel affairs which resulted from "a rough-and-ready verification" made due to jitters before the elections.
					
					 As long as Park does not change the method of state administration, such a mistake in the personnel affairs cannot but persist.
					
					 South Korean CBS also denounced the personnel policy of the Park Geun Hye group on May 29.
					
					 It recalled that Park designated only those hailed from the legal circles as candidates for the "prime minister" during her office and two of them were compelled to drop out even before NA hearing.
					
					 There is a rumor that Park liked judicial officials only to spark off negative backlash.
					
					 As regards this, the editorial quoted an incumbent prosecutor as telling media persons "Chongwadae is little different from a blind man".

articles.title: GIs Commit Awful Crimes in S. Korea
articles.content:
GIs Commit Awful Crimes in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- An awful GI crime was committed in Ryongin City, Kyongsang Province of south Korea on May 31 against the backdrop of unceasing crimes perpetrated by service members of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea.
					 That day a corporal belonging to the second division of the forces and two other drunken service members sexually abused a south Korean woman in a broad daylight. 
					
					 They beat several protesters at random and even struck a south Korean policeman with fists when he appeared later. 
					
					 Not a single day passes in south Korea without witnessing such GI crimes.
					
					 To cite just a few examples, gangsters of the U.S. forces perpetrated a group sexual abuse against a south Korean woman in her twenties on a subway electric car, a GI made a shooting spree at passers-by in the heart of Seoul and drove his car over a local policeman before taking to flight, a drunken GI drove a car at a breakneck speed, causing a traffic accident, and beat south Koreans who chased him and another GI rudely behaved towards a local taxi driver, tightening his neck. These atrocities lash south Koreans into great fury. 
					
					 GIs stabbed employees of a bar, leaving them seriously wounded, knocked passers-by with sticks and set fire to a building, throwing south Koreans into uneasiness and horror. 
					
					 GIs' sexual abuses against south Korean women are getting abominable and cruel as the days go by. 
					
					 Even Americans deplore that 90 percent of U.S. service members in south Korea are leading such immoral life as committing sexual abuses against women. 
					
					 What matters is that GIs continue committing such horrible crimes without hesitation free from any punishment, enjoying extraterritorial privileges under the unequal SOFA. 
					
					 The GIs crimes will never stop as long as the pro-U.S. elements like Park Geun Hye pursue such country-selling politics.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Bulgaria
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- A Bulgarian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Sofia on May 29.
					 Dinko Zhelev, head of the Organizational Department of the National Council of the Bulgarian Socialist Party, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 It decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and undying feats of the President and organize colorful political and cultural events including a remembrance meeting and seminar on his feats.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Benin
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Benin
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- A committee of the Socialist Party of Benin for remembering Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was formed in Cotonou on May 27.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the party, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 It decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and feats of the President on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Kuwaiti Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Kuwaiti Newspaper
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The Kuwaiti newspaper Kuwait Times on May 27 carried an article titled "A peerless great man" on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Kim Jong Il, born in Mt. Paektu, performed immortal exploits on behalf of the era and history with his far-sighted wisdom, outstanding leadership ability and gigantic revolutionary practice, the paper said, and went on:
					
					 He conducted energetic ideological and theoretical activities, clearly indicating the way of accomplishing the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence and bringing about great changes in the political, military, economic, cultural and all other fields, unprecedented in the history of the nation spanning five thousand years.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK always remember the forced march for field guidance made by him day and night.
					
					 He devoted all his life to the dear country and people.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are revering him as the eternal sun as he laid a solid foundation for the prosperity of the country and put the dignity of the nation on the highest level.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Beninese Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Beninese Political Figure
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, issued a statement on May 26 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il made an extraordinary contribution to the cause of party building while leading the WPK for nearly half a century.
					
					 The greatest one of his exploits in party building is that he developed the WPK into an ideological integral whole and a party which achieved the firm unity and cohesion.
					
					 The WPK achieved the unity in thought, purpose and moral obligation based on one idea and one center and gave fullest play to the ever-victorious might as the guiding force of the Korean society thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who always raised it as an important requirement for party building to achieve the unity and cohesion of the whole party.
					
					 Another distinguished exploit performed by him in party building is that he built the WPK into a genuine mother party serving the people.
					
					 The WPK led by Marshal Kim Jong Un will glorify forever the exploits Kim Jong Il performed in party building.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Inter-Korean Declaration Marked by Cambodian Radios
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Inter-Korean Declaration Marked by Cambodian Radios
Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Cambodian radios broadcast programs to mark the 14th anniversary of the publication of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 F.M.90.5 Radio broadcast the following program titled "Echo of June 15":
					
					 Eye-opening events unimaginable in the past took place in succession on the Korean peninsula after the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The June 15 era of reunification, which had steadily advanced, encountered with grave challenges due to the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea.
					
					 The group totally denied the inter-Korean joint declarations.
					
					 The north-south relations have faced a bigger crisis due to the present south Korean authorities.
					
					 They are going reckless to stifle the DPRK in league with the U.S.
					
					 They also totally blocked cooperation between the north and the south.
					
					 The vitality of the June 15 joint declaration is immortal.
					
					 The international community sincerely hopes that the Korean nation would reunify the country at an early day under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and peace and stability settle on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The State Radio also aired the same contents.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita a Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita a Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 3 un mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz, Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba.
					El texto senala: 
					
					Estimado companero,
					
					Le extiendo mis cordiales felicitaciones con motivo de su cumpleanos deseandole de todo corazon buena salud y mayores exitos en sus responsabilidades.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe presente de politico mexicano
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe presente de politico mexicano
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio presente que le enviara el dirigente nacional del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico, Alberto Anaya Gutierrez. 
					Laura Julieta, miembro del Comite Ejecutivo Nacional, quien preside la delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico, de visita en Corea, lo entrego el dia 3 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Desarrollada nueva capa protectora de granito
articles.content:
Desarrollada nueva capa protectora de granito
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ACNC) -- Las grandes obras arquitectonicas se construyen generalmente con el granito que tiene alta resistencia a la erosion.
					Ese material de construccion tiene varias desventajas como la superficie ruda y porosa que no se lava facilmente cuando sea contaminada.
					
					Los cientificos del Instituto de Nanomateriales, adscrito a la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, desarrollaron nueva capa liquida que previene la contaminacion de granito.
					
					El liquido esta compuesto por sustancias compuestas inorganicas.
					
					Una vez formada la capa en la superficie de granito, comienzan los efectos protectores con la ayuda de energias naturales como rayo solar, viento y lluvia.
					
					Se aumentan de continuo las demandas sobre el nuevo liquido.

articles.title: Turistas chinos recorren ciudad de Hoeryong
articles.content:
Turistas chinos recorren ciudad de Hoeryong
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, se realizo el primer turismo de los chinos a la ciudad de Hoeryong de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte de Corea.
					Despues de recorrerla los turistas expresaron sus impresiones.
					
					Citado por la ACNC, el subdirector de la Oficina de Asuntos Exteriores de la region autonoma de la nacionalidad coreana de Yanbian, Jin Bo (55 anos de edad) dijo que el turismo Longjin-Hoeryong en omnibus chino le hizo mas intimo el sentimiento de amistad con Corea.
					
					Senalo que la trayectoria del presente turismo fue muy excelente.
					
					Muchos turistas dicen que la ciudad fue acondicionada tan bien como si estuvieran en Pyongyang, apunto.
					
					El turismo de un dia a Hoeryong convertira en un corto plazo esta ciudad en un objeto principal de turismo a Corea de los chinos, asevero.
					
					La empleada de Yanbian News, Sha Chunxia, (44 anos de edad) dijo que quedo admirada al presenciar la funcion artistica de los ninos de jardin de la infancia y continuo:
					
					?Como puede ser tan excelente la funcion de los ninos de unos 5 o 6 anos de edad? No pude contener mi admiracion durante todo el espectaculo.
					
					Nunca pense en forjar a mi hijo tales talentos artisticos.
					
					Fue una funcion impresionante.
					
					Es muy excelente el regimen de ensenanza de la RPDC.
					
					Tengo ganas de enviar aqui a mi hija para que estudie en el sistema de ensenanza tan buena.
					
					En la ocasion proxima, quiero acompanarme de mi hija para ver juntos esta funcion.
